    Talks and presentations

    2018

    • December 17, 2018. "Classical Copying versus Quantum Entanglement in Natural Language: the Case of VP-ellipsis". Workshop Presentation at Second Symposium on Compositional Structures. Strathclyde University, Glasgow, UK. [venue] [slides]

    • September 02, 2018. "Classical Copying versus Quantum Entanglement in Natural Language: the Case of VP-ellipsis". Workshop Presentation at Compositional Approaches for Physics, NLP, and Social Sciences. Nice, France. [venue] [slides]

    2017

    • December 19, 2017. "Lexical and Derivational Meaning in Vector-Based Models of Relativisation". Conference Presentation at 21st Amsterdam Colloquium. Amsterdam, The Netherlands. [venue]

    • October 23, 2017. "Proof Nets and String Diagrams". Invited Talk at Leicester University. Leicester, UK.

    • October 13, 2017. "Lambek with Contractions". Workshop Presentation at DuskoFest. Oxford, UK.

    • September 08, 2017. "Coherent Diagrammatic Reasoning in Compositional Distributional Semantics". Workshop Presentation at 1st Workshop on String Diagrams in Computation, Logic, and Physics. Oxford, UK. [venue]

    • August 18, 2017. "Vector Semantics for Lambek Calculus with Contraction". Conference Presentation at Logic and Algorithms in Computational Linguistics 2017. Stockholm University. [venue]

    • July 19, 2017. "Coherent Diagrammatic Reasoning in Compositional Distributional Semantics". Conference Presentation at 24th Workshop on Logic, Language, Information and Computation. University College London, UK. [venue]

    • June 20, 2017. "Compositional Distributional Semantics". Guest Lecture at Utrecht University. Utrecht, The Netherlands.

    2016

    • July 13, 2016. "Non-Local Information Flow in Compositional Vector Space Models: From enhanced syntax to enhanced semantics". Workshop Presentation at Workshop on Statistical and Logical Models of Meaning at NASSLLI 2016. Rutgers University, New Brunswick, NJ, USA. [venue]

    2015

    • June 21, 2015. "Syntactic control for compositional vector space models". Conference Presentation at Topology, Algebra, and Categories in Logic 2015. Ischia, Italy. [venue] [slides]

    2014

    • January 17, 2014. "Conversions between D and MCFG: Logical Characterizations of the Mildly Context-Sensitive Languages". Conference Presentation at 24th Meeting of Computational Linguistics in The Netherlands. Leiden, The Netherlands. [venue]
